Reviews.Tests Package

The reviews.tests package includes all test modules related to the reviews package. These modules handle testing for functionality, memory usage, and performance of the review-related operations in the platform.

Submodules

The reviews.tests package provides the following submodules:

reviews.tests.profile_reviews module

The profile_reviews module is responsible for profiling the performance of the review-related tests.

reviews.tests.profile_reviews.profile_all_tests()[source]

Profiles all test functions in the test suite using cProfile.

reviews.tests.profiler_memory module

The profiler_memory module handles memory profiling for the review-related tests, ensuring efficient memory usage during operations.

reviews.tests.profiler_memory.run_memory_profiling()[source]

Runs pytest while profiling memory usage for the tests.

reviews.tests.test_app module

The test_app module contains the primary test cases for all review-related functionalities, including adding, updating, flagging, and approving reviews.

reviews.tests.test_app.add_test_data(db_session)[source]

Adds test data to the database.

reviews.tests.test_app.app()[source]

Creates a Flask application configured for testing.

reviews.tests.test_app.client(app)[source]

Provides a test client for the Flask application.

reviews.tests.test_app.db_session()[source]

Creates a new database session for a test.

reviews.tests.test_app.get_auth_token()[source]

Creates tokens for authenticated users.

reviews.tests.test_app.test_add_review(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_approve_review(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_delete_review(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_flag_review(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_get_product_reviews(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_get_review_by_id(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_submit_review_with_profanity(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]
reviews.tests.test_app.test_update_review(client, db_session, get_auth_token, add_test_data)[source]

Module Contents

The reviews.tests package aggregates all the submodules for comprehensive testing of the reviews package.
